attributes.action: scrap the proposals to close Castle Hall School, Mirfield, as set out in the “Schools for the Future” plans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Mirfield Free Grammar School is boxed in by two roads and Houses on two sides.  Kitson Hill Road is already disruptive on a morning and afternoon as students arrive and leave school.
Doubling the amount of pupils here would make this situation worse. The traffic would also increase largely.

Surely smaller schools are better. Fewer pupils in classrooms mean more concentration and better learning methods when a teacher can distribute their time to help pupils if needed. 

Also there is a better sense of community at a smaller school, especially at Castle Hall. 
Castle Hall offers a wide range of lessons, especially foreign languages, more than other schools offer. 

The location of Castle Hall is also preferable to that of Mirfield Free Grammar, it is set back from busy roads and houses. 

Castle Hall has over the years been a highly sought after school. 

Castle Hall must remain open and be developed to once again serve the children of Mirfield and surrounding area.
